reporter_caption.center: DESHOTELS v. HOUSTON CONTRACTING CO., 250 La. 745 (1967)

caption.center: HARRY DESHOTELS v. HOUSTON CONTRACTING CO. ET AL.

opinion.posture: In re: Harry Deshotels applying for certiorari, or writ of review, to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Parish of Acadia.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ refused. On the facts found by the Court of Appeal we find no error of law in its judgment.
